name: appflowy
description: AppFlowy is an open-source alternative to Notion and Airtable that enables users to manage notes, documents, databases, and tasks in a secure and self-hosted way. It supports extensible Markdown editing and offline-first syncing.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Work without internet, sync automatically when connected. Never lose productivity

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Extensible editor with rich formatting and block-based structure. Flexible content creation

features.title: Database Views
features.description: Multiple views including table, board, calendar, and gallery. Visualize your way

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete data ownership and privacy on your infrastructure. Your data, your control

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Native apps for desktop and mobile platforms. Work anywhere
